jon fodge ‘da sa’chars’ chithrapatayedi nawatha prekshaka awadhanaya yomu wanne tharuna wud kerehiya.‘ool da fayin yang kanibals’ (1960), ‘splendar in da gras’ (1961), ‘woren biyat’ tharuna wiyata pa thabu surupi wudge ranganaya akadami saha goldan glob sammana sandaha da yojana wiya.ewani suwisheshi jayagrahana laba ganna wita wud wayasa awurudu 25 k wath sapura nothibima suwisheshi karanawak.1961 di boks ofis wartha thabu robat wayis ha jeram robinsange ‘west sayid strori’ nam githamaya chithrapataye mariya lesa aya kala ranganaya itha wishishta ekak wiya.ehi wu wudge premaniya ranganaya prekshaka aakarshanaya noaduwa dina ganimata samath wiya.
